description: Try our easy to follow Layered Kiwi Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free
name: Layered Kiwi Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Combine oats, seeds and quinoa in a bowl. Combine syrup, honey and oil in a small pan over low heat and stir until warmed and smooth. Pour over oat mixture and stir well to combine. Transfer to tray and bake for 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes, or until evenly browned. Remove from oven, stir in dried cranberries and set aside to cool completely. Break into clusters.

Meanwhile, heat 11/4 cups water in a small pan over medium heat until simmering. Add tapioca and cook for 15 minutes, stirring often, or until tender. Remove from heat, cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes to cool. Combine with yoghurt.

Process half the kiwifruit in a small food processor until just smooth. Using a flower-shaped cutter, cut kiwi slices then press against insides of serving glasses. Add alternate layers of tapioca yoghurt, oat clusters and puréed kiwi. Serve.
